# hidesForSinglePage

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that controls whether the page control is hidden when there is only one page.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hidesForSinglePage: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign a value of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to hide the page control when there is only one page; assign [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default) to show the page control if there is only one page.

## Managing pages

- **currentPage**: The current page, shown by the page control as a white dot.
- **numberOfPages**: The number of pages the receiver shows (as dots).
- **defersCurrentPageDisplay**: A Boolean value that controls when the current page is displayed.
- **updateCurrentPageDisplay()**: Updates the page indicator to the current page.
